OOC: Neo Beast Machines should not be part of Neo Beast Wars Continuity.  
Someday Bluestreak and Andromeda are going to run away to Cybertron, and im 
not letting antoher RPG get in the way. No offense to any memebrs of NBM.

:::Sharpedge/Airazor:::

Sharpedge: I'm ALWAYS up to battle!
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

---------------------------------------------
::Airazor smiled as she pulled away.  She did not like war; war was what 
killed her before.  But she was okay with it if Tigatron was around::
Airazor: Fine then, we will fight together!
